page.title: 09The Rector of Brinklow
page.content: The Rector of Brinklow is responsible for the churches around Newbold Revel Manor.He resides in the Rectory which is situated along Coventry Road. Services are held every Sunday while the children's church takes place on the 2nd Sunday of every month. Annual church events include Wake Service which is held on the 1st Sunday in July and the Harvest Festival in September. The present Rector, Rev. White who has lived in Brinklow since July 1982 does not think that he has been in the village long enough to notice any major changes. He would,if possible,like to see more social contact between the people living at opposite ends of the village.
